item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a professional security consultant with penetration testing as main focus. On this site i will share both security-related material but also maintain articles and videos made on my spare time, which might include Mountainbiking and Discgolfing. My base is just outside of Gothenburg in Sweden. Cheers.
